transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Hi, good evening sir, main Humaira baat kar rahi hun. Senior manager IndiaMART head office se. Bataye kya dikkat aa rahi hai? Aapne customer care pe call kiya hai?
Customer: Haan, main Romesh Jain baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se. Ye Sanjay Trader karke mera ek profile hai aapke paas.
Executive: Achha, okay, theek hai.
Customer: Haan, maine IndiaMART pe abhi abhi register karaya hai. Mujhe hafta 10 din unko hue.
Executive: Achha, aap Romesh Jain baat kar rahe hain Sanjay Trader se?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Achha, okay. Aap achchi baat hui hogi account manager se. Services ko kaise istemal karte hain iske bare mein unhone aapko jankari di hogi. To actual mein is problem kya face kar rahe hain?
Customer: Ji, main unhi ko lekar ke aapse kuch kehna chah raha tha.
Executive: Achha, kahiye kya kehna chahte hain?
Customer: Main ye keh raha tha jaise ki hamare unke sath na baat nahi ban pa rahi. Jaise ki agar main kuch product bhi usme add karana chah raha hun to meri unse baat nahi dhang se ho rahi hai. Aur kya naam hai agar main koi buylead search kar raha hun na to maine jaise ki ye paisa diya hua hai na IndiaMART ko. Haan. To jo buylead mere na show nahi kara rahi hai. Main aap bataiye main IndiaMART pe aake mere ko kya fayda ho gaya phir?
Executive: Aap ye keh rahe hain ki kya buylead de nahi pa rahe hain ya show nahi ho rahi hain aise dikkat aa rahi hai?
Customer: Ji, jo maine IndiaMART ko payment diya hua hai, jo payment diya hai maine jaise ki mere paas koi buylead aayegi baat karunga. Ab mere paas to wo buylead hi nahi aa rahi hai jispe main baat karu. Koi dusri nikal nikal ke aa rahi hai usi naam se.
Executive: Okay, abhi aapka catalog just live hua hai sir to relevancy set nahi hui hai. Plus product ko search karke check karke buylead consume karni hoti hai jiske bare mein aapko thoda sa Palak ne bataya hoga. Main ek bar aapki video meeting phir se schedule kara de rahi hun. Wo aapko bahut achche se thoda sa organize kar denge, theek hai?
Customer: Haan, abhi ji bilkul kal ke liye kariye video meet. Aur agar ho sake to koi account manager aap mera change kara dijiye kyunki inse meri baat nahi ban pa rahi hai. Kyunki ye active nahi hai mujhe lag raha hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir, main aapko unka number de de rahi hun na. Main aapko unka number de rahi hun personal. Aap note kariye aur unse baat kar lijiyega. Koi dikkat wali aisi baat hai nahi, theek hai?
Customer: Number to unhone apna diya tha mujhe aisi baat nahi hai.
Executive: Achha, okay. Nahi sir dekhiye abhi aapko ek hi din hua hai, aaj hi baat hui hai video meeting hui hai. Koi aisa kaafi achche se wo guidance wagera deti hain unse ek bar baat karke dekhiye cheezon ko leke. Koi problem rahegi to phir aap connect kariyega aisi koi problem hai nahi, theek hai? Aur rahi baat agar main buyleads ki aapko bataun ki catalog abhi just live hua hai aur consumption pattern set hone mein bhi initially aapka 15 se 20 din ka samay lagta hai, theek hai? Aap dekhenge aapka jo catalog host hua hai wo 21 November ko hua hai. Abhi aap filhal buyleads ko search karke check karte rahiye and additionally main aapko ek cheez batati hun aapka jo catalog rehta hai usme more information wagera diye aap apne buyleads ke jo notifications hote hain aap unko aur on kar lijiye. Jaise miss call ki notification nahi hai aapki, buylead after night notification ye on nahi hai. Kaafi sari cheeze hain jo on nahi hai isme. Wo on ho jayega.
Customer: Ye sir na mujhe chalana nahi aata IndiaMART abhi. Hello?
Executive: Koi baat nahi sir aisa hota hai, nahi chalana aa raha koi baat nahi. Dekho aaj thoda sa aapko guide kiya hai dopahar mein Palak ne. To mujhe koi jaise ki maine to dekho haan, main ye keh raha tha jaise ki local ki team se bhi maine nahi karaya hai isliye maine Noida ki taraf se karaya hai ki koi mujhe support mil sake. To koi support mujhe milega koi sikhane ke liye ya koi?
Executive: Nahi aisi koi problem wali baat hai nahi sir hum available hain support ke liye aap chinta na kare us cheez ko lekar, theek hai? Aur rahi baat meeting ki to sir Palak kabhi bhi available aap kabhi bhi call karenge account manager ko ya main aapko apna personal number de rahi hun aap hume connect kariye koi dikkat wali baat thodi hai. Kuch issue nahi hai sab samjhane wala agar wo hai to hamari taraf se properly support milega aapko.
Customer: Theek hai aap apna number bata dijiye jo main bhi call laga saku phir aapko.
Executive: Haan, aapko number main aapko whatsapp kar rahi hun isi number pe, theek hai? Aur rahi baat aapki video meeting ki ya phir guidance wagera ki to main kal ke liye phir se video meeting laga deti hun, theek hai sir?
Customer: Haan, kal ke liye schedule rakhiye aap.
Executive: Haan, aur baki dekhiye uses karenge aur guidance wagera to phir se de denge aur aisi koi problem wali baat hai nahi. Aur customer care pe call karne ki bajaye aap hume ya Palak ko hi kar lijiyega kyunki aapka call hamare paas aayega hum Palak senior manager hain.
Customer: Achha achha. Haan ji kyunki aap customer care pe karenge to bhi Palak ke paas hi call aayengi aur phir agar dikkat rahi to hamare paas call aayengi to behtar hai hum aapko aapka apna number de rahe hain koi dikkat hai to aap whatsapp kar de ya direct call laga de ya Palak ko call kar le, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai. Theek hai sir, bas yahi hai to aapko call lagane ki problem ka samadhan nahi nikalta phir.
Executive: Ji ji. Baki hum customer care pe call kara tha aapne to ticket open ho gaya tha wo hum band kar de rahe hain, theek hai sir? Aur kal aapko connect kar le rahe hain video meeting.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai. To kal ko mere ko na video meet pe kuch samjha dijiye jo main bhi kuch samajh saku.
Executive: Haan, koi problem wali baat thodi hai sir samjha denge sari jo bhi doubt aapko aa rahe hain. Aaj bhi samjha thoda bahut kal samjha denge, theek hai?
Customer: Agar isse mere ko sahi lagega do mahine ke andar teen mahine ke andar ek party ki agar meri deal ho jayegi to main update plan hi lunga aapse aisi koi wo nahi hai. Hai na? Main to update plan hi lene wala tha bas mujhe ye pata gaya tha ki update plan se abhi starting sikhne ke liye ye chota wala package sahi rahega isliye.
Executive: Achha, okay. Nahi kyunki mere pehchanne wale hain wo sabke sab update plan mein hi chala rahe hain abhi jitne bhi mere janne wale hain jo local ke to sabka bada plan hi chal raha hai yahan pe. Wo 45000 ka 60000 ka.
Customer: Achha achha. Wo TrustSeal package chala rahe honge wo jo log chala rahe hain. TrustSeal ka is saal do saal se zyada ho gaya.
Customer: To unhone mujhe ek idea diya hua tha ki aap abhi chalane nahi jante ho local se pehle seekh lo ek do mahine chalane ke liye agar mere ko ek deal bhi conversion nikalta hai yahan se to aap agar dedh mahine mein bhi ya nikalta hai to bhi aap mera update plan kar sakte hain sir.
Executive: Achha, okay. Ek deal nikalne se yahan par main chalana seekh jaunga phir to.
Executive: Aisi koi chalane wali koi itni badi baat hai nahi. Ek do bari aur batayenge bas ho gaya ab bas aapko istemal hi to karna thodi cheeze. Aur rahi baat sir aapne 37707 to pehle se hi diye hue hain. TrustSeal ka jo rehta hai wo aapka 45000 plus 18% GST mein bhi aapko mil jayega wo aaram se discount 50000 price hai waise to plus 18% GST aapka 47 mein mil jayega.
Customer: Mera selenium chemical ka kaam hai agar uski ek do buylead mil jayengi main to wahi bechne ke purpose se maine IndiaMART pe aaya hun. Agar ek do buylead bhi aati hain to phir main aapki satisfied hun aapki service se to phir aap jo plan batayengi na 45000 ka ya 60000 ka main uske liye tayar hun mujhe paiso ki koi dikkat nahi hai bas mujhe party milni chahiye ek do mahine.
Executive: Nahi koi koi problem wali baat nahi hai aap totally aapke upar hai cheeze hum bata dete hain pehle kya hai kaise nahi kyunki aap jis service mein kaam kar rahe hain usme kaafi aur bhi competitor hain jinko achcha business aa raha hai inquiry calls wagera aa rahi hain to aisi koi dikkat wali baat hai nahi.
Customer: To kal aap mere ko dopahar mein call kariyega hai na?
Executive: Haan ji main aapko connect karwati hun dopahar mein Palak se bol ke ya main bhi connect kar lungi khud hi aapko.
Customer: Theek hai ji theek hai.
Executive: Baki main yahan se ticket band kar de rahi hun abhi ke liye aur kal aapko call kar lungi. Customer care ki jagah mujhe call kar lijiye main whatsapp number de rahi hun aapko apna.
Customer: Okay okay de dijiye isi number pe.
Executive: Main aapko de de rahi hun.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not able to connect with account manager.

- Buyleads are not showing properly.

- Needs guidance on using IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Scheduled a video meeting for the next day.

- Provided personal WhatsApp number for direct contact.

- Explained catalog relevancy and consumption patterns.

- Offered to close the customer care ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Video meeting scheduled for the next day.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, account manager, video meeting, catalog, trustseal, subscription
